00009 #include <limits.h>
00010 
00011 #include "hash.h"
00012 
00013 #define MULTIPLIER -1664117991
00014 
00015 class CHashTableItem
00016 {
00017 public:
00018   CHashTableItem(char * pcKey, CObject * pClObject);
00019   virtual ~CHashTableItem();
00020   char * pcKey;
00021   CObject * pClObject;
00022   CHashTableItem * pClNext;
00023 };
00024 
00025 CHashTableItem::CHashTableItem(char * pcKey, CObject * pClObject)
00026 {
00027   this->pcKey= new char[strlen(pcKey)+1];
00028   strcpy(this->pcKey, pcKey);
00029   this->pClObject= pClObject;
00030   this->pClNext= NULL;
00031 }
00032 
00033 CHashTableItem::~CHashTableItem()
00034 {
00035   delete [] pcKey;
00036 }
00037 
00038 CHashTable::CHashTable(bool bClean) : CObject()
00039 {
00040   this->bClean= bClean;
00041   iNumItems= 0;
00042   for (int i= 0; i< HASHTABLE_SIZE; i++)
00043     pClItems[i]= NULL;
00044 }
00045 
00046 CHashTable::~CHashTable()
00047 {
00048   CHashTableItem * pClTmpItem;
00049 
00050   for (int i= 0; i< HASHTABLE_SIZE; i++) {
00051     while (pClItems[i]) {
00052       pClTmpItem= pClItems[i];
00053       pClItems[i]= pClItems[i]->pClNext;
00054       // If this is not only a reference then delete it ...
00055       if (bClean)
00056         delete pClTmpItem->pClObject;
00057       delete pClTmpItem;
00058     }
00059   }
00060 }
00061 
00062 int CHashTable::Hash(char * pcKey)
00063 {
00064   char * pcKey_cp= pcKey;
00065   long lHashCode= 0;
00066 
00067   while (*pcKey_cp) {
00068     lHashCode= lHashCode * MULTIPLIER + *pcKey_cp;
00069     pcKey_cp++;
00070   }
00071   return ((int) ((lHashCode & INT_MAX) % HASHTABLE_SIZE));
00072 }
00073 
00074 CHashTableItem * CHashTable::Find(char * pcKey)
00075 {
00076   int iIndex= Hash(pcKey);
00077   CHashTableItem * pClItem= pClItems[iIndex];
00078   
00079   while (pClItem != NULL) {
00080     if (strcmp(pClItem->pcKey, pcKey) == 0)
00081       break;
00082     pClItem= pClItem->pClNext;
00083   }
00084   return pClItem;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void CHashTable::Put(char * pcKey, CObject * pClObject)
00088 {
00089   CHashTableItem * pClHashItem= Find(pcKey);
00090 
00091   if (pClHashItem == NULL) {
00092     int iLoc= Hash(pcKey);
00093     pClItems[iLoc]= new CHashTableItem(pcKey, pClObject);
00094     iNumItems++;
00095   } else
00096     pClHashItem->pClObject= pClObject;
00097 }
00098 
00099 CObject * CHashTable::Get(char * pcKey)
00100 {
00101   CHashTableItem * pClHashItem= Find(pcKey);
00102 
00103   if (pClHashItem != NULL)
00104     return pClHashItem->pClObject;
00105   else
00106     return NULL;
00107 }
00108 
00109 void CHashTable::ForEach(Function fFunction, void * pParam)
00110 {
00111   CHashTableItem * pClHashItem;
00112 
00113   for (unsigned int uIndex= 0; uIndex < HASHTABLE_SIZE; uIndex++) {
00114     pClHashItem= pClItems[uIndex];
00115     while (pClHashItem != NULL) {
00116       fFunction(pParam, pClHashItem->pClObject);
00117       pClHashItem= pClHashItem->pClNext;
00118     }
00119   }
00120 }
